Docs.summary: Provides types that allow applications to read and write the components of an XPS document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In addition to the interfaces and the types that represent the major parts of an XML Paper Specification (XPS) document, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging> namespace provides control over the packaging process, including digital signatures and Digital Rights Management (DRM) of XPS documents.
For more information, see the [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications-and-standards/standards/ecma-388/).
